name: Home is where the Heart is (maxeonyx)
name_original: Home is where the Heart is (maxeonyx)
description:
What does home mean to you? To Venly the Virus, Home is where the Heart is.

Home is where the Heart is is a skill-based platformer that takes inspiration from Focus and Super Meat Boy.

It was created in 48 hours in the Global Game Jam. Here is its project page.

Peter Galloway - Game design, level design, art

Max Clarke - Programming

Source code on GitHub.
